javadoc:
Command to merge a Folder with its Parent folder. Immediate children of
 the folder are moved to its parent.

methods.name: <init>

params.name: treeName
params.comment: name of the tree that this command affects

params.name: folderName
params.comment:
name of the folder (module) that is being merged in
 with its parent

params.name: parentName
params.comment:
name of the parent that will end up with children of
 the folder named folderName

name: MergeFolderCmd
comment:
Command to merge a Folder with its Parent folder. Immediate children of
 the folder are moved to its parent.
